title: Typosition
content:
**[Indicies](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210544/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indicies) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210544/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Typosition**

[http://www.typosition.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210544/http:/www.typosition.de/)

Design studio in Offenbach, Germany. Founded by [Peter Reichard](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210544/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Peter%20Reichard). Publishers of [Spatium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210544/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Spatium) magazine.
author: paul d hunt
